setBigContentTitle(java.lang.CharSequenc.Description: Overrides ContentTitle in the big form of the template. This defaults to the value passed to setContentTitle().

bigText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Provide the longer text to be displayed in the big form of the template in place of the content text.

setSummaryText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the first line of text after the detail section in the big form of the template.

ClassDesc: Helper class for generating large-format notifications that include a lot of text. If the platform does not provide large-format notifications, this method has no effect. The user will always see the normal notification view. This class is a "rebuilder": It attaches to a Builder object and modifies its behavior, like so:
